name: Soccer Ball Finger Juggling - flick the ball - mobile ready project
name_original: Soccer Ball Finger Juggling - flick the ball - mobile ready project
description:
This project is fully functional game. Game is ready for release.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
Tap the soccer ball to make it juggle. For every juggle player gets +1 score. If ball hits the wall score will reset to 0.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 
I hope you will like this template and please check out my other projects. Thank you!
